title: LoL Client Crashing During Queue
body: Whenever I join a Queue right when it gets to the part where it says to accept a game, it crashes. I have tries reinstalling LoL, updating Java, and punching the table, none of these have worked. This is especially annoying because when you try and join a game repeatedly, you get a leaver buster. I have an HP Windows 10, if there are any suggestions please help me out.

replies.body: This could be happening for a few reasons, but the most common in this case may be due to third party programs interacting poorly with league.  If you have any apps running like play.tv, lolrecorder, etc remove them.  Let me know if that helps!
Thanks, but I don't use or even have any of these programs. Is there another possible solution?

There could be but I'll need some more information.  When you say crashing, can you elaborate on what exactly you're seeing or is happening?  Are you receiving any error messages and what do they say?  Let me know!
I am getting a notification from my computer that says that LoL.client has crached. I have also found out from toying around that I can play custom games.

Thanks for the details!  There may be an issue with drivers or even your game files failing to render the game properly.  I suggest going over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide for troubleshooting steps towards resolving this.  Go over each step to make sure everything is covered.
I'm using the repair corrupt files thing, I'll tell you if it works.
Good News! It worked! Thanks a whole lot for your help.
